roleset.name: having no grounds, unwarranted
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. Relation to base.02.

example.name: arg1
example.text: because we are just planning for the baby . Yet , our small family does not have any foundation . This thought may be a little selfish . However , having a child is still a matter that-1 [*-1] is baseless . -RRB-
